pages.title: Orbital Scan #0074
pages.text: $(bold)Subject: Acheronite Refinement$()$(br2)Acheronite shards are raw and unstable. You can't make armor out of frozen screaming crystal. Well, you $(italic)can$(), but the results are unpleasant.$(br2)The $(bold)Acheron Forge$() solves this. Geothermal heat can refine raw shards into $(bold)Refined Acheronite$() â€” a stable, workable material.$(br2)$(italic)This is theoretical. You're the field test. ORSA thanks you. From orbit.$()

pages.title: Requirements
pages.text: The Acheron Forge needs two things:$(br2)$(li)$(bold)Depth:$() Must be placed below $(bold)Y=0$(). It draws power from geothermal heat.$(li)$(bold)Heat Source:$() A Geothermal Core within $(bold)8 blocks$(). No core, no refinement.$(br2)Place a shard in the input slot. If conditions are met, it processes into Refined Acheronite in a few seconds.$(br2)$(italic)ORSA Health Advisory: Do not lick the forge.$()

pages.title: Acheron Forge
pages.text: Obsidian frame, ice shards for cooling, Thermal Core for heating. Fire and ice in one box.
